verbose_text: In a previous study, it was demonstrated that PrP (106-126)-induced neuronal apoptosis is prevented under hypoxic conditions by the activation of HIF-1alpha and that HIF-1alpha is involved in the regulation of the expression of prion protein to protect neurons.
evidence: PrP (106-126)-induced neuronal apoptosis is prevented under hypoxic conditions by the activation of HIF-1alpha
